response.original_title: Matter Is a Relative Matter: Brian Catling
response.overview: Brian describes his artistic journey and how he creates all forms of art. This film captures the power of his extraordinary imagination and creativity. Brian firmly believes that we are all creative beings and that we all have the power of imagination, the ultimate gift that we all have the potential to develop.
response.tagline: This second episode of 'Matter Is a Relative Matter' takes us into cultural capital, and with the Intellectual, Spiritual, Social, and Experiential capital at the forefront of the work of artist, poet and author, Brian Catling.
response.title: Matter Is a Relative Matter: Brian Catling

results.name: Matter is a Relative Matter with Brian Catling: part 2
